caption: The image is a greeting card for Ramadan Kareem. The text on the card reads, "May this Ramadan bring you peace, harmony, and joy. I pray to Almighty Allah to protect and bless you. Ramadan Kareem!" The card is from the company Liceria & Co.
original_title: DarkGreen & Simple Gold overay Ramadan Greeting Phone Wallpaper & Socmed Story
texts: May this Ramadan bring you peace, harmony, and joy. I pray to Almighty Allah to protect and bless you. Ramadan Kareem!
